properties.areaDesc: John Day Basin; Ochoco-John Day Highlands
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 6:41AM PST until January 13 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...Moderate to heavy snow will continue through the Monday morning...

.A winter storm will bring a prolonged period of moderate to
heavy snow over the mountains through Monday morning. Significant
accumulations are expected for the Cascades and Blue Mountains.

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches in
the John Day Valley and 3 to 5 inches over the Ochoco-John Day
Highlands.

* WHERE...John Day Basin and Ochoco-John Day Highlands.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY
